rationales.description: AR exceptions totaling $2,586,167.48 significantly exceed the $50,000 materiality threshold, posing a high risk to financial accuracy and reporting integrity.
rationales.recommended_action: Investigate and resolve AR exceptions by reconciling outstanding balances and validating transactions.

rationales.description: Flux exceptions count of 47 indicates potential control failures in variance analysis, which could lead to undetected material misstatements.
rationales.threshold_breached: Control threshold for flux exceptions breached
rationales.recommended_action: Perform detailed variance analysis to identify and address root causes of flux exceptions.

rationales.description: Bank duplicates count of 13 suggests data quality issues that could result in inaccurate cash balances and reconciliation errors.
rationales.recommended_action: Review and eliminate duplicate bank entries to ensure accurate cash reporting.

rationales.description: Accruals exceptions totaling $711,808.57 breach compliance with regulatory reporting standards, requiring accurate accrual accounting.
rationales.recommended_action: Validate and adjust accruals to ensure compliance with regulatory standards.
